text.0: flow onward soma winning kine and steeds and all that gives delight.
text.2: flow onward from the waters flow inviolable from the plants.
text.4: soma as pavamana pass over all trouble and distress.
text.5: sit on the sacred grass a sage.
text.6: thou pavamana foundest light thou at thy birth becamest great.
text.7: o indu thou art over all.
